website_summaries.verdict: An affordable roaster with unmatched performance for its price range. An excellent value for the money.
pros: Garners praise for its solid construction and even heat distribution, which consistently yields excellent results
cons: Rare complaints of pitting and/or flaking over time

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: no electric knife included!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the holidays! It was my first time cooking a Turkey so I decided to get something that will last! It definitely is very heavy duty and I know I will be using it every year for a long time! It was super easy to clean after baking the turkey and ham! The only thing I was disappointed with was that it listed that there was an electric knife that was came in the kit ... I didnt receive that ..I got just a regular carving knife.. I couldn't return since I needed the set for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: tnspaulding

customer_reviews.title: This pan/rack set was perfect for our 26 lb
customer_reviews.text: This pan/rack set was perfect for our 26 lb. Thanksgiving turkey. The tools came in very handy and clean up was a snap. The pan and rack are non-stick and wiped clean with a sponge. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stec

customer_reviews.title: Love This Set! Great Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great combination! We needed a new knife, and this one is great; but, for a few more bucks (and I mean a few--we only paid 1/2 of what this is currently selling for) we got a great roasting pan, thermometer, etc. Can't beat the quality and the value. I love using this roasting pan for roast chicken and turkey. It’s the best I’ve owned.
customer_reviews.author: Book Glutton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made design
customer_reviews.text: Great size, heavy duty, easy to clean. The knife is great- very sharp, good weight and tang design.
customer_reviews.author: nevab

customer_reviews.title: Cooked a turkey like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a turkey like a champ. 22lb bird no problem. Could of put a bigger one on it thankfully 22lbs was enough to feed the herd this year. Cleaned up back to looking like new!
customer_reviews.author: kaddy028

customer_reviews.title: Loved!
customer_reviews.text: Made a great fist turkey with this. Loved all the accessories too! This was a great price for the quality and what I saw on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the deal of the year
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a little more heavy piece.a little to expensive for the thinnest of the product.
customer_reviews.author: MARIA TRETO

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Uswd for Turkey roasting I am very unhappy with this product The material change color after the first use The price is not adequate to the quality
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The whole set was amazing to have for thanksgiving! Dad was impressed and he’s a chef.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy roaster with rack and tools
customer_reviews.text: This is my first roaster and it allowed me to cook an 18 lb turkey to a golden delight like a pro. It is sturdy and solid, and I expect it to last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Horn

customer_reviews.title: Nice roaster!
customer_reviews.text: Rosted our turkey. Lifted right out on the rack. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: I got it very quickly; thanks Amazon! I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got it very quickly; thanks Amazon! I already used it to cook chicken. Cleaning was a breeze!!! Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaya Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great set for roasting
customer_reviews.text: Held a rather large turkey for Thanksgiving. The included tools made the job even easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Glover

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. First use will be lasagna for a crowd!
customer_reviews.author: Norma Good

customer_reviews.title: Nice. It worked great
customer_reviews.text: I got this pan for my four layer lasagna I make. Nice. It worked great . No cutting lasagna noodles to fit pan. I use six lasagna noodles for each layer No sticking. Cooked evenly. It is also great for 20lb turkey. The best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: David N

customer_reviews.title: All the tools were useful and I felt prepared for cooking/serving a turkey for ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this when I cooked our Thanksgiving turkey for the first time! All the tools were useful and I felt prepared for cooking/serving a turkey for 15 people.
customer_reviews.author: M Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quite big enough for a 7 rib roast, but still works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughter who is novice cook. First use was to be turkey but she actually cooked 5 bone standing rib roast to perfection. Knife is fantastic for cutting ribs away from roast then cutting into one inch thick steaks. Excellent quality roasting pan and electric knife set. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with this set. It's high quality and sturdy. I'm excited to do my first turkey in it, but so far I've done a couple of large pork loins and it's been wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless pan
customer_reviews.text: I've thrown away too many of the coated Teflon type from Stuff-mart because the surface peels after one cleaning. I'm weary of disposable kitchen wares. This is a high-quality stainless pan you'll be passing down to the next generation someday. It's great for large casseroles as well and not just roasts and large birds at holidays. The shape of the roasting rack allows air to circulate so the whole bird gets a cooked evenly. The lifting forks are something I would not have purchased separately but now would not want to cook a large without. My only tip is to have an extra thermometer on hand. The one in this set did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well, maybe not the best ever but it's right near the top. I bought this set because we didn't have a roaster pan. We used it for this year's Thanksgiving turkey. We used all the items in the set and it really worked out well for the 16 lb turkey we had, not only for the roasting but handling the turkey for stuffing and carving. Since I am the "turkey chef" I found the set to be a good investment. We don't roast a lot but I can tell that that might change now. I can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken D

customer_reviews.title: Best Roaster
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality - heavy made with very good heavy handles. Looked for the best roasting pan I could find. This fits the bill. Throwing in the rack, baster, thermometer, knife & fork made this a no brainer. Any one who has wrested a hunk of meat to turn it over or put it on a plate will appreciate the meat hooks too. Can't wait to use this on Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: DawnsFolly

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expected from Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: This pan is too flimsy and bent in a preheated oven.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to cook for the holidays!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful roasting pan and carving set! I look to many years of use!
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Faulty description
customer_reviews.text: Good roasting pan and rack. Description stated electric knife included. It was not, only regular carving knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easier
customer_reviews.text: The knife is excellent . My husband cuts homemade bread with it and it leaves few crumbs. A bonus for clean up! The roasting pan is just what I needed. And the meat thermometer, and meat lifter come in really handy. All in all We got a lot of quality items for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: HASH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Mom for Christmas and she loved it! Everything came just as it is shown. We had no problem with it fitting in our oven (and we don't have a special oven it is just a plain old oven).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great bundle of all the things you will need for a turkey or any roast.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Just what he needed
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my Son, he loved it, was a perfect assortment. Very good item.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: You get so much for your money. I haven't ...
customer_reviews.text: You get so much for your money. I haven't tried it out yet bought after thanksgiving. Can't wait to make a turkey
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: its bigger than I thought it would be but I love it !!!! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Cazier Van Cott

customer_reviews.title: This roasting pan was perfect for a 16 pound turkey on Thanksgiving
customer_reviews.text: This roasting pan was perfect for a 16 pound turkey on Thanksgiving, and a 10 pound prime rib roast on Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Felix

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart 7117-16 Chef's Classic Stainless-Steel 16-inch Rectangular roaster
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy product for making bigger pieces of meat such as a prime rib roast or turkey. I often cover my meat but use this roaster when open baking is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jone

customer_reviews.title: Definite Quality - - Affordable Enough For "Real People" !
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering this type roasting pan for over a year, but I just couldn't justify the price for the other brand I had been seeing. I'm so glad I waited for the Cuisinart. This is definitely a quality roasting pan, and affordable enough for real people. It is not QUITE as heavy as the AllClad, but almost as heavy, and certainly heavy enough! I'm pretty sure it will perform just as nicely and for as many years as the pricier brand. I appreciate value, and I consider this to be a great one!
customer_reviews.author: dorothy schulz

customer_reviews.title: CHEFS STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this roaster if you are at all serious about cooking. It warped immediately in my 500 degree oven, the high temperature I used to start my Thanksgiving turkey. Also completely useless over two burners to make gravy--everything immediately burned, it has major hot spots, and horrible heat conduction. The bottom is, as another stated, like tinfoil. I was very surprised at the poor quality, being so happy with other Cuisinart bakeware I have purchased. It is a waste of money and I am currently requesting a refund from Amazon or Cuisinart. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: smith7977

customer_reviews.title: I got a Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I guess I got a great deal on this set when I purchased it 2 days ago it was 36 bucks and now its up to 94 I liked the set so much that I came back to buy a 2nd set for a gift. It was a steal at 36 well made pan and nice extras The knife was worth what I paid for the set. I guess the sale is over but still a very nice gift idea. .
customer_reviews.author: MovedToTN

customer_reviews.title: The knife went through the turkey like butter. Never again shall I have to cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Never had an electric knife before but boy it makes a difference when cutting up the giant turkey. The knife went through the turkey like butter. Never again shall I have to cut turkey by hand. This kit was great for Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

product_meta.title: Cuisinart Chef's Classic - 16" Stainless Steel Roaster Pan, Silver
product_meta.description: Style Name:Roaster, Rack and ToolsIdeal for turkey dinners or large roasts, these roaster sets provide the perfect solutions for everyday family meals, parties and holiday celebrations. Lifting is made safe and easy with sturdy construction and wide-grip handles on each roaster pan. Included preparation and carving tools help you bring dinner to the table with ease. Make and bake holiday classics or prepare family favorites any time of year with these versatile must-haves. Features: Premium stainless steel offers optimal cooking performance|Large capacity roaster ﬁts in all standard-size ovens and is perfect for baking and roasting|Stainless steel cooking surface for lasting food release and performance|Removable stainless U-rack is designed for even heat circulation and drainage of fat and oils during cooking|Riveted wide-grip handles provide comfortable lifting and ensure strength and durability|Dishwasher safe for added convenience|Includes: Turkey Lifters (2) CTG-01-TL Turkey Baster CTG-00-PLB Meat Thermometer CTG-00-MTM Fork and Knife C77TRC-3P
feature_bullets: Premium stainless steel offers optimal cooking performance
Large capacity roaster ﬁts in all standard-size ovens and is perfect for baking and roasting
Stainless steel cooking surface for lasting food release and performance
Removable stainless U-rack is designed for even heat circulation and drainage of fat and oils during cooking
Riveted wide-grip handles provide comfortable lifting and ensure strength and durability
